tourPlans.grandMonthHighlight3: Heritage villages, Red Sea leisure, NEOM vision

tourPlans.twoWeekHighlight1: Historic cores of Jeddah, Makkah, Madinah
tourPlans.twoWeekHighlight2: Capital city experiences and Diriyah evenings
tourPlans.coastalDesc: A focused itinerary covering Red Sea indulgence, AlUla's timeless landscapes, and immersive cultural workshops.
tourPlans.coastalHighlight2: UNESCO marvels in AlUla and Mada'in Saleh
